content.query:
CREATE DATABASE training;


CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE RawStorage1
WITH(
    LOCATION='https://practicestoragemilgard.blob.core.windows.net/training/raw/'
);

SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK '*',
    DATA_SOURCE='BikeShareStorage',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
) AS [result];

-- https://practicestoragemilgard.blob.core.windows.net/training/raw/fairy_tail_qa/train.csv

SELECT DISTINCT *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'fairy_tail_qa/*',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'RawStorage1',
    FORMAT='CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION='2.0',
    HEADER_ROW=TRUE
)AS [result];




-- This is just the query text we will use as input
DECLARE @tsqlQuery NVARCHAR(MAX) = N'
    SELECT *
    FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''fairy_tail_qa/train.csv'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''RawStorage1'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS Result;'


    -- This executes the procedure, passing in the query from Step 1
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set @tsql = @tsqlQuery;
